title: You guys wanna feel old?
body:
We live in a time where if we link Chocolate Rain or Rick Roll or Angry German Kid, etc,  to someone, chances are, it'll be a new meme to them because most of the internet was learning how to walk when these vids were a thing.
And in another 10 years, Darude Sandstorm will be an antique meme.

There's something very depressing about all of this.
